pos_mean_info_list.mean: [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指支取存款的余额或减去各种开支后的尾数。
含义较广，可指数学运算中的余数，也指从整体取走或用掉部分后的所余部分，或一群人走掉一部分剩下的人。
常指人或动物死后的遗体或遗骨，也指古代文明的遗迹或去世作家尚未发表的遗稿。
最普通用词与定冠词连用，指任何指定数量的人或物等。
指超过需要数量之外的剩余。

word_group.brief_definition: 人体残骸；人类遗骨；人类遗骸

bilingual.source: This tree remains erect in the wind.
bilingual.target: 这棵树在风中依然挺直。

bilingual.source: The answer to the puzzle remains elusive.
bilingual.target: 谜题的答案依然难以捉摸。
冠军的记录依然无人质疑。
尽管他很成功，但他依然很谦虚。

bilingual.source: Despite his injury, he remains quite spry.
bilingual.target: 尽管受了伤，他依然相当敏捷。
面对挑战时，她依然保持理智。
尽管这样，他们的友谊依然坚固。

bilingual.source: He remains in good health at this age.
bilingual.target: 他在这个年纪依然保持着健康的体魄。

bilingual.source: He remains modest even after achieving success.
bilingual.target: 他在取得成就后依然保持虚心。

yingyinNormal.en: Today, this remains our mission, to make it easy to do business anywhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天，这依然是我们的使命，让天下没有难做的生意。

yingyinNormal.en: The brain is like that, its electromagnetic field remains charged, just briefly even after death. Circuits remain open.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的大脑也一样，人死后大脑的电磁场仍然处于通电状态，电路依然通畅。

yingyinNormal.en: Jack still sees the beam dropping down and Jill still sees the light beam travel a longer distance, except this time Jack and Jill cannot disagree on the speed because the speed of light remains the same no matter what.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克依然会看到光束反弹吉尔还是会看到该光束移动得更远，例外的是，这次杰克和吉尔却会对光的速度有分歧。这是因为光的速度无论如何还是保留不变。

yingyinNormal.en: All that remains of the road is a runway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 道路尚未完工的部分便成了跑道。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Yusuf Al Ahmadi remains in solitary confinement in Guantanamo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尤瑟夫·艾哈迈德仍被单独监禁在关塔那摩监狱。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean all that remains by a shred of silk down by the Han River.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是指汉水边上的那一堆堆尸体吗？

yingyinNormal.en: He's right. Take out all legitimate personnel. Anyone that remains is a terrorist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说得对，调走所有的合法公务人员，剩下的就都是那些恐怖分子了。

yingyinNormal.en: This Seed belongs to our creators, whoever they are. There remains a price on my head.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这颗种子属于我们的造物主，不管他们是谁我仍被悬赏捉拿。

yingyinNormal.en: 17 years and still evolving with the times remains an entirely foreign concept to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十七年都过去了，你仍然不打算与时代同步。

yingyinNormal.en: From here, I can also see the remains of a road that cuts across the Yanomami territory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在上空，我还能看到残存的横穿雅诺玛米领地的道路。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Because if even one of those ships remains operational a whole lot of people are gonna die.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为即使只剩下一架能正常运作，还是会有很多人被杀死。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, it goes without saying that I would outrank the three of you, but the question remains, by how much?
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然自不待言，我的地位理应高于你们三位，但问题在于：高多少呢？

yingyinNormal.en: What's a fossil? A fossil is the remains of an animal that lived long ago when there were dinosaurs. Dinosaur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么是化石？所谓化石呢就是很久以前的动物死了之后的遗体，比方说恐龙时代。恐龙！

yingyinNormal.en: And now nothing remains but for me to assure you in the most animated language of the violence of my affections.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我的话已经说完，除非是再用最激动的语言把我最热烈的感情向你倾诉。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, no, we had a break-in, some little bastard smashed it to bits. We found the remains out there in the porch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是这样，我们家被人闯入过，有个小混蛋把那东西打碎了，我们在门廊上找到了碎片。

yingyinNormal.en: Part of your brain remains activated. What about the rest of me? I can see my hands and my feet. They still move.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你大脑的一部分仍在运作。那我身体的其它部分呢？我的手脚仍然可以动。

yingyinNormal.en: Sherlock Holmes always says when you eliminate the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 神探福尔摩斯曾说过，排除所有不可能因素，剩下的即使再不合理，必然是事实的真相。

yingyinNormal.en: There were two types of vinyl in the burnt-out remains of the car. One, the actual passenger seat, the other, a good copy. Well, good enough. Effectively a costume.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在被烧毁的车的残骸中，发现了两种氯乙烯，一种是座椅上的，另一种是个仿品，仿得还挺像，相当于伪装。

yingyinNormal.en: On the other hand, if the money supply remains the same, while more goods and services are produced, each dollar's value would increase in a process known as deflation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一方面，如果货币供应量不变，但商品和服务增加，每一分钱的价值就会增加，这过程就叫通货紧缩。

yingyinNormal.en: On the other hand, if the money supply remains the same, while more goods and services are produced, each dollar's value would increase in a process known as deflation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一方面，如果货币供应量不变，但商品和服务增加，每一分钱的价值就会增加，这过程就叫通货紧缩。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists also may locate buried <highlight>remains</highlight> by using such technologies as ground radar, magnetic-field recording, and metal detectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家还可以利用地面雷达、磁场记录和金属探测器等技术来定位埋在地下的遗骸。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: To test that theory, the team examined the yellowish, dried <highlight>remains</highlight> inside the vessels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了验证这一理论，研究小组检查了血管内淡黄色的干燥遗骸。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 保持, 逗留, 剩余
